#summary Services Searching

= Services Searching =

The derivatives of the class Lastfm.Services.Search allow you to search for content on Last.fm. Searching is currently supported for Tags (through TagSearch class), Albums (through AlbumSearch class), Tracks (through TrackSearch class) and Artists (through ArtistSearch class).

== Example ==
{{{
using System;
using Lastfm.Services;

namespace Application
{
	class MainClass
	{
		public static void Main(string[] args)
		{
			string API_KEY =	"b25b959554ed76058ac220b7b2e0a026";
			string API_SECRET = 	"361505f8eeaf61426ef95a4317482251";
      
			Session session = new Session(API_KEY, API_SECRET);
			
			// You can search for a track by title and artist or title only.
			TrackSearch s = Search.ForTracks("i will", session);
			Console.WriteLine("Items per page: " + s.ItemsPerPage.ToString());
			Console.WriteLine("Total count: " + s.ResultCount.ToString());
			Console.WriteLine("======");
			
			foreach(Track t in s.GetPage(1))
				Console.WriteLine(t);
			
		}
	}
}
}}}
